item.description:
Hey everyone!

NH got bombarded with snow this past weekend and will continue to get some flurries this week. Great time to head up to Mt. Sunapee! They have more terrain and the best grooming than any other resort in NH. It's not far from Boston too!

Anyone who's interested in going this coming Saturday, I can take two people in my car from Somerville. If you have a car or need a ride, please let people know when you reply. We will meet up in the main lodge upstairs in the corner, right below the bar at 10 am.

Hope to see you there!

-Melissa
item.name: Day trip to Mt. Sunapee
